title: 95/81/EC: Commission Decision of 17 March 1995 amending Commission Decision 94/205/EC laying down special conditions for the import of frozen or processed scallops and other Pectinidae originating in Japan (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 March 1995 amending Commission Decision 94/205/EC laying down special conditions for the import of frozen or processed scallops and other Pectinidae originating in Japan (Text with EEA relevance) (95/81/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: From 1 January 1995 Annex C of Decision 94/205/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 99, 19. 4. 1994, p. 38.
ANNEX
'ANNEX C
List of establishments approved for the export of frozen or processed scallops and other Pectinidae to the European Community
>TABLE>
